name: Ravishing Rocket
description:
Get Ray the rocket to the end of the level. Difficult little game.

I made this game as part of the complete C# and unity course taught by Ben Tristem on Udemy. I'm just trying to improve my skills with unity and C#.

KNOWN ISSUE: Game's lightning completely breaks for me on google chrome. Game works fine on Firefox. Issue may be exclusive to me.
